actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to provide relief to certain small business concerns by prohibiting the enforcement of their contractual indebtedness to the United States for a period of 3 years.

summary.text: Prohibits the enforcement of the contractual indebtedness of small business firms in default on such indebtedness to the United States for a period of three years upon a showing that their inability to pay is due to economic factors outside of their control.

titles.title: A bill to provide relief to certain small business concerns by prohibiting the enforcement of their contractual indebtedness to the United States for a period of 3 years.
